item.title: Cryptocurrency Total Market Cap Drops Below $4.1 Trillion
item.description: On August 15th, based on CoinGecko data, the total cryptocurrency market capitalization has dropped below $4.1 trillion and is now at $4.068 trillion, with a 24-hour decrease of 1.3%.

item.title: Federal Reserve Chair Nominee Samorlian: Supports Fed Cutting Rates by 50 Basis Points Next Month
item.description: On August 15th, according to Bloomberg, Marc Sumerlin, an economist who is regarded as a potential candidate for the Fed chair, said that policymakers should make a significant cut in interest rates next month. However, he also warned that if long-term U.S. bond yields rise, they will have to stop cutting rates. Sumerlin is an economist at the consulting firm Evenflow Macro.Marc Sumerlin stated that the 4.3% federal funds rate is too high, and there is a 50-basis-point room for rate cuts. Due to the inverted yield curve, he is in favor of a 50-basis-point rate cut.

item.title: A whale withdrew 25,600 SOL from Binance, worth approximately $4.94 million
item.description: On August 15th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale withdrew 25,600 SOL from Binance after a month. The amount withdrawn is approximately worth $4.94 million.

item.title: Solana Ecosystem Meme Coin HODL Surpasses $60 Million Market Cap After 22 Hours
item.description: On August 15th, according to the market information from GMGN, the meme coin HODL in the Solana ecosystem has exceeded a market capitalization of 60 million US dollars. It currently stands at 60.57 million US dollars, with a 22-hour trading volume of 15.07 million US dollars.BlockBeats reminds users that meme coins have no real use case and experience high price volatility. Therefore, investment should be made with caution.

item.title: New York State Legislators Propose Crypto Tax to Fund School Project
item.description: On August 15th, as per the report by cryptoslate, New York legislators are giving consideration to a bill that is intended to impose a tax on digital asset transactions.The proposal was put forward in the state assembly on August 13th. It is planned to implement a 0.2% consumption tax on the buying or transferring of digital assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum starting from September.According to the proposed bill, the tax revenue will be utilized to support the expansion of substance abuse prevention and intervention programs in schools across upstate New York. Those individuals or entities that facilitate these digital asset transactions will be obligated to pay this tax. If it is passed, New York will become one of the increasing number of regions that are exploring dedicated taxation on digital asset activities.

item.title: Deribit will launch linear Bitcoin and Ethereum options settled in USDC
item.description: On August 15th, according to The Block, the cryptocurrency derivatives exchange Deribit (now owned by Coinbase) intends to launch linear Bitcoin and Ethereum options priced and settled in USDC on August 19th, thereby expanding its stablecoin settlement products to the two major cryptocurrencies.Deribit announced that it will also introduce Bitcoin and Ethereum futures contracts settled in USDC as a supplement to its existing USDC-settled perpetual contracts.

item.title: 「Big Brother Whisperer」 Huang Licheng Increasing Long Positions in BTC and ETH, Total Position Size Exceeds $100 Million
item.description: On August 15th, according to Chain.info, "Brother Ma" Li Cheng Huang is currently boosting his leverage by 25 times for an ETH long position and 40 times for a BTC long position. He is holding 21,900 ETH (with a nominal value of $100 million) and 50 BTC (with a nominal value of $5.9 million).

item.title: If Bitcoin drops below $116,000, the mainstream CEX long liquidation volume will reach $2.078 billion
item.description: On August 15th, based on Coinglass data, if Bitcoin drops below $116,000, the cumulative long liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs will reach $2.078 billion.Conversely, if Bitcoin exceeds $120,000, the cumulative short liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs will reach $938 million.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not display the precise number of contracts to be liquidated or the exact value of the liquidated contracts. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what degree the price of the underlying asset will be influenced when it reaches a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that when the price reaches that level, it will trigger a stronger response due to a liquidity avalanche.

item.title: Bitcoin Briefly Drops Below $118,000
item.description: On August 15th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $118,000 and is now trading at $118,068, showing a 24-hour decrease of 0.42%.

item.title: The US 30-year Treasury bond yield is 109 basis points higher than the 5-year yield, the widest level since 2021
item.description: On August 15th, the yield spread between the 30-year and 5-year U.S. Treasury bonds arrived at 109 basis points, which is the widest level since 2021. (FX168)
